scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy-plugin
scripts.release: npm run bump-version && git add package.json plugin.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run bump-version major && npm run release:commit-and-tag
scripts.release:minor: npm run bump-version minor && npm run release:commit-and-tag
scripts.release:patch: npm run bump-version patch && npm run release:commit-and-tag
scripts.release:commit-and-tag: git add package.json plugin.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin main --tags
